hero.name: Quang Dao
hero.subtitle: Full Stack Developer & Tech Leader with over 3 years of experience developing web applications, AI systems, and management solutions.

about.title: About
about.intro: Hello! I'm Trần Quang Đạo, a Full Stack Developer and Tech Leader with a passion for creating innovative and efficient technology solutions.
about.description1: With over 3 years of experience in developing web applications, AI systems, and enterprise management solutions, I have accumulated extensive knowledge of React, Node.js, Python, and modern cloud technologies.
about.description2: I'm always seeking new challenges and opportunities to learn and grow. My goal is to create high-quality technology products that deliver real value to users.

education.title: Education
education.university: Hanoi University of Science and Technology

experiences.title: Fullstack Developer
description: Developed web-based internal process management system to digitize and automate company processes
Improved operational efficiency by optimizing administrative processes
Responsible for full-stack development, working on both backend and frontend
Implemented CI/CD pipelines and containerization with Docker for fast and scalable deployment

experiences.title: Tech Leader
description: Led team developing smart energy management system for Samsung
Built simulation tool to compare energy usage levels
Created user segments for Vietnam, India, and Thailand with localized electricity pricing models
Used NextJS, NestJS, PostgreSQL, Docker, and CI/CD

experiences.title: Tech Leader
description: Developed global job connection platform connecting Vietnamese students with international opportunities
Built freelance job marketplace for project-based recruitment
Integrated course registration module for Korean universities
Used ReactJS, Redux, NodeJS, MongoDB, WebSocket, Firebase

experiences.title: Fullstack Developer
description: Developed full-stack web applications using React and Node.js
Worked with team to develop new features

projects.title: CRM Management System
projects.description: Comprehensive Customer Relationship Management (CRM) system with analytics dashboard, leads management, sales pipeline, and detailed reports. Supports real-time updates and email marketing integration.

projects.title: AIPT Internal Process Web
projects.description: Web-based internal process management system to digitize and automate company processes. Improved operational efficiency by optimizing administrative processes.

projects.title: Chatbot AI - ALICE
projects.description: AI chatbot integrated with internal process management system. Supports natural language interaction for QA, internal document search, and database access.

projects.title: AI-Assisted Meeting Management
projects.description: AI platform to improve meeting audio quality with noise reduction, echo cancellation, and volume normalization. Processes audio and converts to text.

projects.title: Video Master AI
projects.description: AI video analysis platform detecting and filtering human and vehicle activities. Dashboard with RESTful APIs and WebSocket for real-time result streaming.

projects.title: People & License Plate Recognition
projects.description: Access control system based on computer vision to detect people and recognize license plates. Real-time video processing with deep learning and OCR.

projects.title: Samsung Energy Simulator
projects.description: Smart energy management system for Samsung to estimate electricity cost savings and optimize consumption. Simulation tool comparing energy usage levels.

projects.title: INVESTY Platform
projects.description: Global job connection platform connecting Vietnamese students with international opportunities. Freelance job marketplace and course registration module.

projects.title: Data Extraction Tool - LYNX
projects.description: Desktop data extraction and monitoring tool for Android devices. Enables remote access and control, real-time extraction of camera, microphone, files, contacts, and messages.
